Detailed Description

Limitations of the Software. Most of the limitations are due to the decision of trade-off either the memory storge or run-time or both. If larger capabilities are requested, do let me know. Thanks. By the way, another limitation of this software is that in fact it is not thread-safe. One reason is that I don't know how to write thread-safe codes. Second, I tried to replace the current STL with the STLport's thread-safe STL and found that the run-time almost double than before. Because so far this software is only used for a stand-alone non-window program, this issue leaves as a future enhancement.

static unsigned int FMLimits::maxDegreeOfCells ( ) [inline, static]
Returns:
maximum (weighted) degree of cells. Note that for SOED cost model (Sum-Of-External-Degrees), the limit should be further divided by 2 in order to guarantee no risk.

Referenced by FMPartMgrBase::FMPartMgrBase().

static unsigned int FMLimits::maxFanOutOfNets ( ) [inline, static]
Returns:
maximum number of pins per net. Note that the partitioner can tolerate the present of high-fanout net by pruning them out before start. But it may degrade the quality of results if a circuit contains a lot of such nets.

Referenced by Net::isHighFanout().
